Goldencobra::Article creating an article should require a title
Goldencobra::Article creating an article should not require a url_name because it is filled automatically

Goldencobra::Article creating an article should create a new article given valid attributes
Goldencobra::Article creating an article should have a valid redirect url by inserting an url with https
Goldencobra::Location should have no latitude and longitude because of missing city
Goldencobra::Location should not have a latitude and longitude
Goldencobra::Location should have a latitude and longitude

User should have many roles through role_users
Goldencobra::Setting changing a value successfully changes a value

testsuite.name: with an user who is logged in

testcase.name: Goldencobra::Api::V2::ArticlesController with an user who is logged in should return a json status 400, 'article data missing'

testsuite.name: without an user who is logged in

testcase.name: Goldencobra::Api::V2::ArticlesController POST #create without an user who is logged in should return a json status forbidden
HttpValidator with http adds nothing if 'http://' is present
HttpValidator with https adds nothing if 'https://' is present
HttpValidator without protocol adds nothing if nothing is present
HttpValidator without protocol adds 'http://' if missing
Visitor should have many roles through role_users

testsuite.name: when logged in as a visitor

testcase.name: Goldencobra::ArticlesController permissions: an RSS feed with protected documents when logged in as a visitor should give a complete rss feed
Goldencobra::ArticlesController permissions: an RSS feed with protected documents when logged in as a visitor should be possible to read the root article as rss

testsuite.name: when logged in as a admin

testcase.name: Goldencobra::ArticlesController permissions: an RSS feed with protected documents when logged in as a admin should give a complete rss feed
Goldencobra::ArticlesController permissions: an RSS feed with protected documents when not logged in should not be possible to view a restricted article as rss
Goldencobra::ArticlesController permissions: an RSS feed with protected documents when not logged in should give a reduced rss feed
Goldencobra::ArticlesController permissions: an RSS feed with protected documents when not logged in should be possible to read the root article as rss
Goldencobra::ArticlesController permissions: an RSS feed with protected documents when not logged in providing an auth_token should respond with '401-Nicht authorisiert' if the token is incorrect
Goldencobra::ArticlesController permissions: an RSS feed with protected documents when not logged in providing an auth_token should give a complete rss feed if the token is correct
